summary: Design is a multifaceted concept that encompasses innovation, sustainability, and creativity. It involves crafting solutions that rejuvenate our planet and society through decentralized systems and regenerative approaches. This principle extends beyond mere aesthetics, emphasizing the creation of resilient, interconnected ecosystems. Design thinking can be applied to various aspects of life, from fostering innovative practices to grooming personal and professional environments. It encourages adaptability, strategic vision, and the infusion of creativity to tackle global challenges and create beautiful, functional spaces.
excerpt: Innovation should enhance the planet and society. Decentralized, regenerative design can solve global challenges, shifting from harmful practices to resilient, interconnected ecosystems.
